articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: All sides must honour Good Friday Agreement, Taoiseach says at unveiling of John Hume bust - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Micheal Martin is in Strasbourg for a series of engagements in the Council of Europe, marking Ireland’s presidency of the body.
articles.content:
Updated 1 hour ago
ALL SIDES MUST honour the Good Friday Agreement, the Taoiseach has said at the unveiling of a bust of Nobel laureate John Hume at the European Parliament in Strasbourg.

articles.title: EU officials say common charger will help consumers and environment - Euronews
